content.title: Configuring Services for Edit Recipients
content.body:
1. In the Mapping Editor, map the following service parameters from the left pane to the widgets on the right pane:
    • From the left pane select RecipientID {number}.
      From the right pane expand Label - lblPayeeID, and select text {string}.
      Iris displays an alert regarding a mismatch of data types, click OK.
    • From the left pane select FirstName {string}.
      From the right pane expand TextField- tbxFirstName, and select text {string}.
